description: On May 26, 2020, the respondent filed a Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit asking the Court to substitute an unredacted copy of exhibit 2 with a properly a redacted copy of exhibit 2 that is attached to the Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment, filed May 26, 2020. ORDERED that respondent's Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit,...
text:
WASHINGTON, June 4 \-- United States Tax Court issued the following order in
May. 29:

On May 26, 2020, the respondent filed a Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s)
asking the Court to substitute an unredacted copy of exhibit 2 with a properly
a redacted copy of exhibit 2 that is attached to the Declaration of John R.
Mikalchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment, filed May 26, 2020.
Because a trial ofthis case has not been conducted, the Court will retitle the
respondent's Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s) to the respondent's Motion
to Substitute Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of
Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment and will grant it.

Upon due consideration and for cause, it is

ORDERED that respondent's Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s), filed May 26,
2020, is recharacterized as respondent's Motion to Substitute Exhibit 2 of
Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary
of Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that respondent's Motion to Substitute Exhibit 2 of Declaration of
John R. Mikalchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment is granted in that
the Clerk ofthe Court shall detach Exhibit 2 from respondent's motion and file
it as Redacted Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of
Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that the Clerk ofthe Court shall detach Exhibit 2 from the Declaration
of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment
and file it as Unredacted Exhibit 2 of the Declaration of John R. Malchus in
Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that the Unredacted Exhibit 2 of the Declaration of John R. Malchus in
Support of Motion for Summary Judgment is placed under seal and shall be
retained by the Court in a sealed file which shall not be reopened for
inspection by any person or entity except by Order of the Court.

(Signed) L. Paige Marvel Judge

Dated: Washington, D.C. May 29, 2020 For any query with respect to this
article or any other content requirement, please contact Editor at
[contentservices@htlive.com](mailto:contentservices@htlive.com)

title: UNITED STATES TAX COURT ISSUES ORDER REGARDING DANIEL SERFATY VS COMMISSIONER OF INTERNAL REVENUE CASE [U.S. Fed News]
html:
WASHINGTON, June 4 -- United States Tax Court issued the following order in May. 29:

On May 26, 2020, the respondent filed a Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s) asking the Court to substitute an unredacted copy of exhibit 2 with a properly a redacted copy of exhibit 2 that is attached to the Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment, filed May 26, 2020. Because a trial ofthis case has not been conducted, the Court will retitle the respondent's Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s) to the respondent's Motion to Substitute Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment and will grant it.

Upon due consideration and for cause, it is

ORDERED that respondent's Motion to Substitute Trial Exhibit(s), filed May 26, 2020, is recharacterized as respondent's Motion to Substitute Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary of Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that respondent's Motion to Substitute Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment is granted in that the Clerk ofthe Court shall detach Exhibit 2 from respondent's motion and file it as Redacted Exhibit 2 of Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that the Clerk ofthe Court shall detach Exhibit 2 from the Declaration of John R. Mikalchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment and file it as Unredacted Exhibit 2 of the Declaration of John R. Malchus in Support of Respondent's Motion for Summary Judgment. It is further

ORDERED that the Unredacted Exhibit 2 of the Declaration of John R. Malchus in Support of Motion for Summary Judgment is placed under seal and shall be retained by the Court in a sealed file which shall not be reopened for inspection by any person or entity except by Order of the Court.

(Signed) L. Paige Marvel Judge

Dated: Washington, D.C. May 29, 2020 For any query with respect to this article or any other content requirement, please contact Editor at contentservices@htlive.com
